pageTitle: Chicago's Mixed Income Communities | Chicago Tonight | WTTW
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {25158=Take the example of Daphne Islam Gordon, who moved into Oakwood Shores in January. She pays market-rate rent., 29226=Verna Phillips-Koger once lived at Stateway. She moved out, only to return in 2008. Between her exit and return, the place was transformed. For one, CHA demolished Stateway and replaced it with a new development called Park Boulevard. Before her move Phillips-Koger had lived among poor people, but when she returned (she was the first on her block), the agency had altered the development's mix of people, too.}
